description:
This is a list of typos, grammatical errors and improvements I propose for the web app:
File location: community-app/tree/reskin/app/global-translations/locale-en.json
Unify spacing between message key and message definition. Either put a space after the colon or don't. Compile snapshots of changed portions on user interface before and after for verification purposes, name a folder you've created after your username in https://goo.gl/2qYXuZ and deposit your pictures therein.
name: Fix Typos And Grammatical Errors Found In Web App
